body.p:
To his Exelency
Thomas.E. Bramlette
Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

Whereas Ped Wilson Stands indicted in the owsley Circuit Court for being in Company to gether with other Confederate Soldiers when a mare was taken from one Isaac Thomas in owsley County by and Sd Indictment was found and is filed in the owsley Circuit Court Clks office Sd mare was taken in time of the Rebelion and by the Confederate Soldiers and ^Ped^ Wilson was a Confedrate Soldier.. and afterwards in about 20 days Ped Wilson procured the return of Sd mare to owner Isaac Thomas and Satisfiy him for the damages.. and this and none other is the Charges is against him that is known to your petitioner Ped wilson and we your petitioners do believe that Ped Wilsons case which we present to your Excelency is one worthy of your Excelencys clemency and hope he will receive a pardon from your Excelencys hand. (he is a citizen of owsley County his post office is Boonville owsley Co. ky.

Isaac Thomas
Calaway Bowman
E W Bowman
Allen Newton
Joseph Thomas
Wilbern Bowman
Wm Burns
Samuel Johnson
James Angel
